response.overview: 1996 saw Budapest's famous Sziget Festival christened Pepsi Sziget '96 with a bigger budget, more star performers and a broader selection of cultural programs than ever before. This film provides a short taste of Budapest's famous pop pageant where the atmosphere is always something out of this world. It does its very best to capture the marvellous madness enjoyed by anyone lucky enough to have been there in person.
response.title: Szigetfilm '96
